attributes.action: Should the UK government  close down tax havens such as Jersey ,Isle of Man or Cayman Island?
attributes.additional_details: It is time for our UK government to close down tax havens owened by  our government such as Jersey, Isle of Man , Cayman Island and others. An estimate of £80 billion is being lost in tax every year because of these havens.By closing them down we can reverse cuts and bring back growth into our economy. This government has the legal powers to close these tax havens down , right now if they wanted to.
